Definition.WordDefinition: Parks, AR Zip code(s): 72950 Parks, LA (village, FIPS 59165) Location: 30.21529 N, 91.82941 W Population (1990): 400 (181 housing units) Area: 1.4 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Parks, NE Zip code(s): 69041

Parks n : United States civil rights leader who refused to give up her seat on a bus to a white man in Montgomery (Alabama) and so triggered the national civil rights movement (born in 1913) [syn: {Rosa Parks}]
